Source.Name: seccure
Source.Summary: The seccure toolset implements a selection of asymmetric algorithms based on elliptic curve cryptography (ECC).
Source.Description: The seccure toolset implements a selection of asymmetric algorithms based on elliptic curve cryptography (ECC). In particular it offers public key encryption / decryption, signature generation / verification and rudimentary key establishment.

Package.Name: seccure
Package.Summary: The seccure toolset implements a selection of asymmetric algorithms based on elliptic curve cryptography (ECC).
Package.Description: The seccure toolset implements a selection of asymmetric algorithms based on elliptic curve cryptography (ECC). In particular it offers public key encryption / decryption, signature generation / verification and rudimentary key establishment.
